title: I no longer enjoy this game...
body:
I no longer enjoy playing LoL...

This season is the worst by far to me, it seems so broken, every player is using items that used to be at a 3000+ gold vaule at the start of the game... ppl with support type rune pages are doing more dmg than dmg rune pages...

i just do not understand how to play this season or why certain classes like support do more dmg and sustain than mages now...

Or why players get free move speed boosts and dmg boosts for seemingly no reason...

i was dedicated to this game and played since season 2, and finally season 6-7 i started getting decent and got plat 5 two seasons in a row...

now this season im hardstuck in silver 1...

i just cant figure out how to use these basic rune pages or understand why certain runes which i would consider support like are out damaging hard dmg rune pages and champs...

I just dont think im going to continue playing and it seems ive wasted hundreds of dollars and years of time on a game that is no longer suited for me... 

I've been a master yi main since season 2, and its not feasible to play master yi in any lane or jungle anymore, its just not the same with these new runes, i dont know how to fix yi to be like he was with masteries AND runes...

it is very disappointing to play and realize i wont get anywhere playing the champ i loved for years...

i tried to find the best pvp type game there was, and i thought this was it for years...

now i just dont understand how this game works anymore,

i just needed to vent and say something because i loved this game for a long time...

Now i no longer even want to play it...

Are there any new revamps or changes coming soon? because i do not want to play this season anymore...

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure insanity is the only fuel that gets me to queue into a game.

Just the small smudge of hope that it will be a fun game.

.....Nope it's a slaughter fest that's boring as fuck.

People just keep playing under the hope that eventually this game becomes less shit. Not even BETTER let alone good. Just less shit. 
If there would be just one fuckin game that could compete with league this game would die in an instant.
wow you've played this game for years and now youre starting to get sick of it? Who would've thought!

The Game used to be much more balanced out and therefore much more fun. Sticking to a game for Years just because of how much you enjoy it makes you kind of grow attached to it, so its even harder to let go of it once you stop having fun.
You can try to stop... but you will get back... eventually

I just wish they would fix matchmaking...

That's all I wish for.

Play ranked. Problem solved. Normal mmr and ranked mmr are different. Because of this, it's not rare for diamonds and silvers to be in the same game - their rank doesn't matter. A situation like that literally can not happen in ranked.

That's bullshit. Utter bullshit. 

I understand that normal are for goofing around/trying new things/ playing with friends/ etc etc, but even in normal its not fun when someone on my team is getting stomped to hell. I want even matches. Shouldn't be only in ranked. Even in ranked, its hardly even.

Meh.  It's lame, sure.  But that's how it goes.  If you go to the gym to play a pickup game of basketball, do you expect everyone to be the same height and skill level? For what it's worth, norms have their own mmr.  It just doesn't come with a rank (obviously) lol

ranked match making is the problem.
getting paired with people with pathetic 40% winrates who wonder why they lose every game.
way too much variance in ranked match making, especially since you can duo que in ranked just makes the variance way too much.

nothing better than getting  2 silver 1 gold and 2 unranked on a team vs 5 prev gold last season players :)
Same, Im just waiting for the new adc tbh. Tho abusing Sej jungle recently has been pretty fun hehe

Idk how you are abusing Sej jungle? I am on my phone too lazy to check your Elo but Sejuani is not that good until you reach high platinum. People are just too bad to follow up your engage and CD in lowe Elos its basically hell. If you dont play hard easy mode carry junglers you aint gonna climb. Just abuse that Shyvana. Shes basically an assassin with single half damage item and 3k+ hp late game that can oneshot 2 targets with REQ combo.

This isnt my main anyway so you didnt miss much. I was diamond last season, dropped to low plat for now tho. 
https://i.gyazo.com/de8952e8b9d5767e2905f7ce2b826565.png Not many games but it was pretty fun having impact again (felt like better jungler or sometimes fed bot lane wins in my last like 20 mid lane games). 

She did get nerfed but imo she is good because she can gank a lot early, clear pretty fast with E (especially Scuttle), and ofc cc a ton. Tanks are kinda weak past like minute 20 on their own, but you can still get Locket or Zekes or something for your adc.
I can still switch to abusing Kha tho until he gets nerfed heh
Let me play 3 games top get fed then post them saying top has a lot of influence on the game in 20 threads
So jungle doesnt have a lot of impact?

I’ve been playing since season 2 as well and I find these runes the most disturbing thing. See I'll play a champion like ezreal and I pick commet because I feel like it's the best pick on him but it's not. The best is klepto and any champion who can abuse a rune that gives extra gold over damage. I mean it astounds Me how much more gold is in the game than it used to be.

I wouldn't say Kelpto is the best. I would agree it is the most used, but I have seen various iterations of runes run on Ezreal. I have a friend who runs Dark Harvest Ezreal and builds {{item:3147}} / {{item:3146}} and he typically runs through the enemy team one-shotting people. I'd say that there is moer diversity and choice for players with the current rune system. You just have to decide "Am I the type of player who can make different set-ups work, or am I a meta slave?" I play Aatrox bot lane with Fleet Footwork. It's never run (I have yet to see someone else do it) and it works fine. I win a lot more than I lose, and I have a lot of fun doing. I've never been able to do it before.
Move on babe, try something new, see if any indie devs have made a sleeper masterpiece
pretty sure the people that said yes are the people that are like "but it can be good eventually" no bring back season 3 4 5 runes/masteries and make runes free.

I don't really think it matters what the runes manifest as. I'm pretty sure most people, myself included, just go on op.gg and copy runes/builds. Nothing really changed for me except that I got all runes for free.

You just don't see the bigger picture. Riot promised we would play champs in entire different playstyle due to runes and they were right: Now you play camille as a poke mage instead of a fighter. 
Fiora doesn't duel and stab people with her sword, she is now pickpocketing them for gold and items. 
Jax plays like a neutral monster buff that gives his team 12% more dmg on a target while being a budget tank. 
Sejuani is an assassin now, malphite too. 
Ornn is a burst mage now.

> I've been a master yi main since season 2

Found the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Xerath Aim Bot,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JXbEEbFH,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2018-02-13T20:01:02.169+0000)
>
> Found the issue.

I logged just to upovte you.

TBH League never felt like a fully balanced game. In fact early on I feel like the key focus wasn't competitive balance, sure, it was a part of the equation but it wasn't the main goal. 

Everyone felt like they were a little more over the top and crazy and people who couldn't keep up tended to get buffs. 

I feel like now it's been a few seasons of heavy handed nerfs on rotation so that everyone can combat anything and when something is out of balance in that kind of environment, it presents a HUGE problem. It's also far more apparent under those circumstances.

TL:DR On average, most champions are more balanced than they used to be, however, this makes unbalanced champions seem like much more of an issue.

iv started playing less
i said id stop out right but iv been to dedicated to this game for years to just stop playing it like i dont like it

i do i love league...old league
not whatever the hell this game is now 

but im pretty sure riot dosent care whatever makes them the most money at the end of the day

Season 8 came with **quite** a few updates & **big changes** to the game, and with reveals we know that there's even more to come. It's fully understandable that all of this is going to give a impact of both positive and negative loaded impressions.

I hope you'll manage through this despite all these wierd changes bombarding us. Early season is a mess and can get the worst out of us. I'm sure you'll find your spark again once the season starts calming down.

much love.

https://giphy.com/gifs/3M4NpbLCTxBqU
BY far the worst season ever for me. The runes take getting used to, but the games are mostly too short and too snowbally and meta picks rule too much.

dark harvest kayn does 1k dmg on his basic attacks mid to late game?
duskblade is probably the most broken item there is in the game and yet ever since i started playing again few months ago i've not seen it nerfed?
tanks are unkillable and deal more dmg than u in any stage of the game?
adc's need twice the peel as before just because u get killed in a split second cuz of new runes and basically ur role becomes pointless?
sustain supports now have limitless heals cuz of new runes and basically laning against them becomes a pain in the ass cuz u always get outsustained?
once someone gets fed he's it's pretty much impossible to get him shut down cuz he prolly does thrice the dmg ur whole team does? 
all i see is overnerfing champs i mean what u should rly nerf is ur items and runes. champs are all fine unless there is a champ that goes really well with a certain rune etc
try vainglory. Mobile and great graphics

I've had worse, there was full tank nauti/tahm kench oneshoting me in season 5 for examples 
glad that never happened again and hope it never will

I gotta admit that the last few patches made the game more bearable. But when preseason 8 hit, i really despised the state of the game, to the point that i was mostly playing out of addiction and boredom.

Season 7 was already too snowbally, and every match ended with an adc just wiping through the other team. And don't get me started on Ardent Censer bs.

"Lategame" champs are still snowballing too early, and the early game is still polluted by people that can chunk half your hp at lvl 1, but at least game length has gone up.

But yeah i miss season 4 and 5 the most.

Unfortunately nobody really cares, just have to learn how to make it fun. It's not the patch, it's just the whiney babies who don't like it, if you thinks it's broken then leave, that doesn't stop me from liking it.

I disagree. I do think most of the complaints on the boards specifically is just whiny bitching but you can't just tell people not to play because they aren't lying to themselves and trying to convince themselves that everything is perfect. I've seen things go to shit because of that attitude. If you like something then that's fine. But if someone else liked it before and doesn't like a change or path it's going down then you have to respect that and actually give an ear if even an unfocused one.

I do hate the whining but telling them not to play because they have something to say that isn't completely positive basically makes it hella likely the persons making the game and in charge lose interest because you've ascended from loving the game to being obsessed to a point they can throw anything to you with minimal effort and the response doesn't change.

Its annoying when you try your best and people keep telling you to 'do better' but it's a different kinda disheartening when you know you could have done better and get the same reply.

Just don`t play if you don´t like the way it currently is. You can play other games. League of Legends won´t suddenly be turned into a ego shooter while you are gone. You can always come back and hope the game gets better in the next 3-4 patches. You can always pirate games if you don´t have the money to play so there is no excuse not to.
I honestly prefer this season over the cancer that is ardent meta however yeah it still sucks nonetheless.

Season 8 or preseason is not the reason the game felt awful to play. Its the season 7 ADC shit fest which is not patched out yet. I would say Riot doing a good job on PBE Mages will finally get back their role as an AP CARRY and not just secondary support.
oh remember the old yi with devourer or ap yi...good times
Season is fine besides cancer new runes lol

> why certain classes like support do more dmg and sustain than mages now...

Because quite a number of nowadays supports were mages before. But Riot decided to reshape them into supports because that's easier to do than actually creating batch of new supports.

Also they had shown they quite dislike mages in general. obviously with few exemptions such as Ahri.

Needles to say they do not want mages anywhere near to harm ADCs.

I'm in the same boat. I took a hiatus midway through season 7, slowly trickling off my playing time. My wife kept playing and commented on the preseason updates saying "It's like a completely different game". 

I had my reservations about that statement, but having got back into it, mechanical and game rust aside, I'm having a really hard time figuring out what the eff exactly is going on and how to play this season. I feel like I would enjoy the game a hell of a lot more if I could find a role and play style that works for me amongst all the muck. 

A lot of things are still the same, GP is still GP, Shaco does what Shaco does, for the most part. It's not the Champs and roles that are throwing me off, it's the subtle nuances that have been changed that are screwing me up personally. It's working out how to play Champs with thier new runes (and for some it completely changes thier game style), all the while trying to work out how to play against someone  who has had thier game style completely changed and revamped and learning how to counter it. Things I used to excel at I'm a total dumpster fire with now, my comfort pick just got reworked, trying new Champs all the while trying to adjust to the meta and learn all the new runes and support item changes has proven to be a chore. I'm sure it would have been easier keeping up with the changes as they happened, but having been away from the game, I feel like a new player again. 

I made the comment to myself last night after I was done playing that "I have no idea what I'm supposed to be doing in this game anymore". That's the big thing for me. **I can't figure out how riot wants me to play.** Plus with them changing everything so drastically every half year, I'm having a hard time justifying to myself why I should continue to try and figure it out, and for what?

I've played nearly every day since Season 1 and I'm still happy. But I don't play ranked and I just go with the flow with whatever Riot hands us. I don't like or dislike changes unless they completely change the champs I like. Like the Vlad rework. I didn't like it and  I miss the old Vlad.  I played him every day, now I don't play him at all.

Then don't play it anymore? I don't understand the i was here from the beginning arguement. It means nothing, if you were here from the beginning or started preseason 8 it doesn't matter, if you don't enjoy playing, then don't.

> [{quoted}](name=coliosismitosis,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JXbEEbFH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-13T12:56:59.172+0000)
>
> Then don't play it anymore? I don't understand the i was here from the beginning arguement. It means nothing, if you were here from the beginning or started preseason 8 it doesn't matter, if you don't enjoy playing, then don't.

And to further on this, you're only level 34, which means you haven't been playing much, so try to learn the new runes and things before you go and complain on the boards about something that was changed and you just haven't felt like reading it. We all have been playing with these runes since preseason. Try to catch up.

U play nearly only norms...

And the ranked games u do play none have even gotten to lvl 18 in the past 10-20 that i see...

You are correct in saying you do not understand how i feel.

You see, I play norms, because contrary to popular belief, it is still league of legends, and I play for fun. Because I enjoy this game, and if you don't learn the new parts of the game, or quit, it's as simple as that, no hostility or posts complaining that you don't like playing what league has become.

The game was 1000 times better in Season 4 or 5. There is no point in "Deal with it, the game has changed".
This way everyone quit the game.
They should repair the game and stop this assasins and tanks fiesta. I would preffer even the old op rengar and nidalee if that means I get the good old times back.
The game just got sick and unfair. There is no point in playing adc anymore, except 2 or 3. There is no point in playing corki, or jhin, or kalista, or lucian.
There is no point in playing some skuishy supports anymore. Who plays sona anymore in ranked? Instead, we get supports like karma or brand who deals more dmg as support than ap midlaner (Wtf?).
And stupid tanks like Maokai, Shyvanna, Jarvan IV should be nerfed to the ground, they can carry the game by themselves. I mean, tank and dmg? Really? Tank should be weak dmg and hard to die(like leona).
In season 4 or 5 there really existed the idea that if you are a nice player who knows how to comunicate, how to positionate and who to focus you climb to platinum. Well, this days there are champs like Talon or Ekko that win the games alone if they find a noob feeding them.
The guy is right. This game went on "the bad road" and riot team should work to fix this. They should balance the game for everyone, not just for the challenger and master tier.
Uhg. I hate the champs that go pure tanky and can demolish my team. Esp when I play adc. The tanky part isn't the issue, it's just the damage they do while being tanky

> [{quoted}](name=Cruełła de Vil,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JXbEEbFH,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-13T19:40:01.258+0000)
>
> The game was 1000 times better in Season 4 or 5. There is no point in "Deal with it, the game has changed".
> This way everyone quit the game.
> They should repair the game and stop this assasins and tanks fiesta. I would preffer even the old op rengar and nidalee if that means I get the good old times back.
> The game just got sick and unfair. There is no point in playing adc anymore, except 2 or 3. There is no point in playing corki, or jhin, or kalista, or lucian.
> There is no point in playing some skuishy supports anymore. Who plays sona anymore in ranked? Instead, we get supports like karma or brand who deals more dmg as support than ap midlaner (Wtf?).
> And stupid tanks like Maokai, Shyvanna, Jarvan IV should be nerfed to the ground, they can carry the game by themselves. I mean, tank and dmg? Really? Tank should be weak dmg and hard to die(like leona).
> In season 4 or 5 there really existed the idea that if you are a nice player who knows how to comunicate, how to positionate and who to focus you climb to platinum. Well, this days there are champs like Talon or Ekko that win the games alone if they find a noob feeding them.
> The guy is right. This game went on "the bad road" and riot team should work to fix this. They should balance the game for everyone, not just for the challenger and master tier.

Meta doesnt matter til higher elo so all this talk about tanks, assassins, yada yada, is probably not the issue at hand that is prevent you from climbing.

> They should repair the game and stop this assasins and tanks fiesta. I would preffer even the old op rengar and nidalee if that means I get the good old times back.

This was cancerous gameplay. 

> Tank should be weak dmg and hard to die(like leona).

Wtf? Leona can literally solo an even ADC early to mid game, if the player knows what theyre doing.

> karma or brand who deals more dmg as support than ap midlaner (Wtf?).

Because theyre arent building support items? Rush Frostfang and then full AP.

Because i used to...

a lot...

that was the whole point of creating this topic...

If playing a game for 6+ years means nothing then why play any games at all...
Because they are fun and the whole point of them is to enjoy yourself, and if you don't go read a book, or play a different game.
